attributes.action: help our community we are neglected by Police crime rising community in uproar
attributes.additional_details: We have contacted Lilian Greenwood MP ,Nottinghamshire Police force and the media . Residents from  our community are left with virtually no police presence ,our roads are being overtaken with hooligans on motor bikes , damage to peoples property and vechiles , families with known sexual abusers living on same streets next to schools .We receive no support from Police as a community we need action to be taken to end this , one small part time police station is not enough , we want to be heard
attributes.background: Clifton Nottingham urgently needs Police presence..hooligans are riding our streets,convicted sexual abusers living next to schools and families.. vechile damage and theft is occurring daily .. Police are almost none exsistent on our estate .residents have no where to turn matters need dealing with

rejection.details:
Local policing is the responsibility of your local Police and Crime Commissioner.

You could raise this issue with the Police and Crime Commissioner for Nottinghamshire, who is elected. You can find out how to contact them here: 

http://www.nottinghamshire.pcc.police.uk/Get-in-touch/Contact-Us.aspx
